headline: 2025-11-04 — Amazon (AMZN.O) will begin cutting 30,000 corporate jobs (30,000 jobs) as part of an expense-paring plan.
2025-11-05 — A new medical study reported that clinicians using AI showed degradation in skills after a few months (time unit: months) of reliance on AI-assisted tools.
2025-11-03 — Ukrainian forces applied artificial intelligence to both air and land drones (2 drone domains: air and land) to help identify targets in the conflict zone.
